about_the_game:
The Cosmetic Upgrade is a cosmetic package for the new Necromancer premium career for Sienna Fuegonasus.

All the cosmetics in the Necromancer - Cosmetic Upgrade are rewarded on purchase.

Cosmetics included:

  • 2 additional character skins (plus one additional color variation of one of them)
  • 3 additional hats
  • 5 additional Soulstealer Staff illusions
  • 5 additional Ensorcelled Reaper illusions
  • 1 additional portrait frame
  • 6 exclusive Keep paintings

NOTE: When purchasing Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Necromancer Cosmetic Upgrade, you will receive 225 Shillings (in-game currency) to spend in the in-game store.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: The Cosmetic Upgrade is a cosmetic package for the new Necromancer premium career for Sienna Fuegonasus. It contains new skin color variations, hats, weapon illusions and more.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
